name: DAIKAIJU DAIKESSEN: NEO BATTLE XROSS
description:
A retro-style fighting game featuring a plethora of monstrous titans battling for supremacy!

The second demos is Daikaiju Daikessen: Neo Battle Xross, a fan game based on various fan comic and original from kaiju creators in this classic King of the Monsters-style fighting game. Try out the game and feel free to leave any feedback.

Basic commands

  • Movement: w,a,s,d
  • Normal Attack: Left click
  • Heavy Attack: Right click
  • Special: Press F (Can also combined with movement buttons to execute alternate special attack)
  • Press Left click for OK, Right click for cancel

*Partial Controller supported
